name: Pipekit
headline: Pipekit scales data & CI pipelines for enterprises
description:
Our app manages Argo Workflows for data teams, enabling complex data &
 CI pipelines in half the time while saving companies hundreds of thousands of dollars annually. We maintain Argo Workflows, an open-source pipeline framework for Kubernetes that’s used in production by Bloomberg, Intuit, Adobe, New Relic, NVIDIA, and many other open-source early adopters.

founders.name: Caelan Urquhart, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder, CEO @ Pipekit (S21) (https://pipekit.io)
ex-Kite, Expo, McKinsey
Functional strengths: community, marketing, ops, finance
Industry experience: dev tools, OSS, digital health

founders.name: J.P. Zivalich, Founder & CTO
founders.description:
Founder, CTO @ Pipekit (S21) (https://pipekit.io)
ex-Docker
Industry experience: Dev tools, OSS, investment banking

# **Data infrastructure,scaled for success**
Pipekit is your partner in data infrastructure and scaling for data science, AI, and ML. We help teams go from notebooks to models serving billions of users. Build for success with Pipekit.
[Book a meeting](https://pipekit.io/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/caelan3/jp-catherine-round-robin?uuid=52d18a26-eaba-42c8-98ad-145b669390ea>)[Get started free](https://pipekit.io/<https:/pipekit.io/signup>)
**Hear from experts**
Learn how Bloomberg and Pipekit both use Argo Workflows on our infrastructures to simplify data operations.
Trusted by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/651361abbfa58e82db23f0db_accure%20logo%20white.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6513675afec356d50d87f0f3_pollination%20logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/65e9c7ab1590078688ceda1c_fetchlogo-large-white.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/672e6e09db6852f2244c3383_CentricaLogo%201.png)
## **What we offer**
With Pipekit, your data infrastructure challenges become opportunities, and scalability is no longer an obstacle but a catalyst for your organization's growth.
### **Services**
Pipekit's dedicated team of Argo experts is committed to helping you overcome challenges and accelerate project timelines. We understand the challenges that stand in the way of your goals, and that’s where we step in.For less than the cost of a full-time engineer, we offer comprehensive support to maximize your Argo Workflows experience, whether for data processing, ML, CI pipelines, or more.
[Book a meeting](https://pipekit.io/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/caelan3/jp-catherine-round-robin?uuid=5144f46f-4f22-406d-93d5-4b3dbd09744b>)[Learn more](https://pipekit.io/</services>)
**Hear advice from our experts**
Gain valuable insights on scaling Argo Workflows effectively. Explore infrastructure optimization, resource management, workflow design, and observability at scale.
### **Product**
Pipekit is the control plane for Argo Workflows, simplifying how you manage data pipelines. Our platform configures Argo Workflows on your infrastructure, offering you production-ready workflows from day one.Create massive data pipelines in minutes, saving valuable engineering time and cloud expenses.
[Get started free](https://pipekit.io/<https:/pipekit.io/signup>)
Pipekit integrates with
![apache spark logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/623cc9e189b0d46c94b806e6_Apache_Spark_logo%202.svg)![Dask project logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/623cc9e37b1b2c3ee7a1b01a_dask.svg)![dbt project logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/623cc9e2f5c577dc0051d3bb_dbt-scaled.svg)![GitHub logo horizontal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/623cc9e2e218792a8b10f5a7_GitHub-Emblem.svg)![Fivetran logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/623cc9e24f51e4a13f771104_fivetran-logo-web%202.svg)
## **Why teams choose Pipekit**
At Pipekit, we recognize the unique challenges that organizations face when it comes to operating data pipelines at scale. It's a realm where reliability and cost-efficiency often seem elusive. That’s why teams are partnering with Pipekit.Here’s how we’re helping organizations address their critical data infrastructure challenges.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6514ec483acba18a084044bf_Timer.svg)
### **Accelerated time to value**
  * Effortlessly install Pipekit and start running production-grade workflows on Kubernetes in a matter of days. We provide a robust set of features out-of-the-box ensuring you can begin optimizing your data processes immediately.


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6514ec4801897d1fe3ba4d2b_ArrowSquareOut.svg)
### **Immediate scalability**
  * Our platform enables autoscaling so workflows adapt to the demands of your processing tasks, and template sharing promotes consistency and development speed across your organization. Our multi-cluster support even ensures seamless workflow orchestration across clusters so you can manage complex data operations at scale.


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6514ec493acba18a084044c3_CurrencyCircleDollar.svg)
### **Reduced costs**
  * Pipekit dramatically reduces the maintenance costs associated with data infrastructure. You are able to hire fewer DevOps and data engineers for maintenance and operation, and Pipekit provides visibility into workflow resource consumption, allowing you to optimize resource allocation and further control costs.


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6514ec498c322f1dd009935c_Medal.svg)
### **Trust and expertise**
  * Our SOC II certificate ensures a secure environment for your data. We are recognized leaders and experts in the Argo community and have earned the trust of community members worldwide.


## Why Argo?
Welcome to container-native data pipelines. Argo Workflows is the open-source workflow engine for running data pipelines on Kubernetes. Learn why ML-driven companies are choosing Argo to scale and reduce cloud spend.
[**Read the docs →**](https://pipekit.io/<https:/argoproj.github.io/argo-workflows/>)[**Try Argo on Killercoda →**](https://pipekit.io/<https:/killercoda.com/argoproj/course/argo-workflows>)[**Arthur AI adopts Argo at scale →**](https://pipekit.io/<https:/medium.com/arthur-engineering/picking-a-kubernetes-orchestrator-airflow-argo-and-prefect-83539ecc69b>)[**FLYR moves workloads to Argo →**](https://pipekit.io/<https:/medium.com/flyr-labs-blog/why-were-switching-off-airflow-sort-of-780c4f58a660>)
![Argo project mascot head vector](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6238902a2906882f1fad2716_Argo.svg)
[![GitHub icon vector](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6238902a29068817e9ad2711_iconfinder-icon%20\(4\).svg)**12K+** Github Stars](https://pipekit.io/<https:/github.com/argoproj/argo-workflows/>)
![Slack icon vector](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/6238902a290688fc13ad2712_iconfinder-icon%20\(5\).svg)
**5K+** Slack Users

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6238902a2906885e50ad26e5/64ab17e169e238fde359f1b2_soc2%20logo.svg)
SOC 2 Type II Certified
Pipekit is SOC 2 Type ll compliant and certified.

Join Pipekit for a free 30-day trial.No credit card required.

generated_description:
**Pipekit** is a compelling startup in the data infrastructure space, founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21. Nestled in Atlanta, GA, the nine-person team is on a mission to scale data and Continuous Integration (CI) pipelines for enterprises, ultimately saving companies time and money.

Initially, Pipekit focused on managing Argo Workflows for data teams, a pivotal tool enabling complex data and CI pipelines to be executed in half the time, which translates to substantial cost savings—hundreds of thousands of dollars annually. Argo Workflows itself is an open-source framework running on Kubernetes, trusted by major companies like Bloomberg, Adobe, and NVIDIA.

The company positions itself as the **control plane for Argo Workflows**, making it easier to create and manage data pipelines. With Pipekit, users can build massive data pipelines in minutes, which saves valuable engineering resources and cuts cloud expenses significantly. Their blend of expertise in data engineering and DevOps means they provide a safety net for teams operating at scale.

**Key offerings from Pipekit include**:

- **Accelerated time to value**: Their platform allows users to set up and run production-grade workflows quickly, minimizing the technical barriers to effective data operations.
- **Scalability**: With features like autoscaling and multi-cluster support, Pipekit ensures that workflows can handle varying processing demands seamlessly.
- **Cost reduction**: The platform requires fewer DevOps resources for maintenance and delivers insights for optimizing workflow resource usage.
- **Expertise and trust**: Recognized as leaders in the Argo community, Pipekit has earned a SOC 2 certification, underscoring their commitment to data security.

The company’s services cater not only to data processing and machine learning teams, but also aim to turn data infrastructure challenges into growth opportunities for organizations. By connecting effectively with the open-source community and leveraging Argo Workflows, Pipekit empowers its clients to accelerate their data-to-value processes while ensuring reliability and efficiency. 

If you're exploring how to amplify your data capabilities, you can start a free trial directly on their website (https://pipekit.io) and see how Pipekit could become an invaluable asset to your data strategy.
